name: 梁文耀
objective: 本課程介紹ARM CPU 及以ARM CPU為核心之微算機系統。內容包含：ARM CPU介紹、ARM CPU指令集、ARM組合語言與C程式之關係、Memory定址與存取、時序、I/O控制之介紹等相關主題與實作。
schedule:
The ARM Microprocessor Architecture (1W)
ARM Development Environment + Lab (1W)
The ARM Instruction Set - basics + Labs (2W)
Exam (1W)
The ARM Instruction Set - advanced + Labs (4W)
The ARM Assembly and C Language + Labs (2W)
Input and Output (2W)
EV44B0 Development Environment (1W)
I/O Addressing and Accesses (1W)
I/O Programming Lab - 7-Segment (2W)
